altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

title.en: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine

description.en: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.

description.pt-br: Uma garota yandere que é obsecada pelo seu amigo de infância.

altTitles.id: Today the Villainess Has Fun Again

description.en:
My friend stole my boyfriend and then dared to hand me a wedding invitation with a smile? Ha! I had a blast enjoying my revenge and came home and fell asleep but...when I woke up I was in the body of the Villainess of a Romance Fantasy novel who has everything: appearance, assets, and intelligence. The only thing this girl lacked was the insight to judge a man. Throw the bastard Prince away to the main female lead and let us just enjoy the luxury of power and money!

---
From growing up in a dysfunctional family to being cheated on, Sojin never had it easy. So after waking up in the body of villainess Reilynn Candmion, daughter of the empire’s wealthiest duke, all she wants is to revel in her riches. But something feels amiss when the story’s heroine, Iris, constantly starts fights with her — from stealing her dress to seducing her fiancé. Reilynn wants no drama, but Iris and her four love interests won’t leave her alone! Can’t a girl just wanna have fun?
description.fa: یه روز زنی که به عنوان یکی زنان شهری قدرتمند و زیبا شناخته میشد درباره ازدواج دوست پسر سابقش شنید. از زندگی سیر شد و خواب به خواب شد "چراااا من شرور شدم؟" اون نقش یک بانوی شرور رو بازی می کرد که نامزد خودشو از دست داده و شخصیت اصلی زنو آزار میداد. هرچند هیچ چیز بدی درمورد اون وجود نداره چون این شرور همه چی داره! اما اولین کاری که باید انجام بده اینکه که از نامزد اشغال و دختر بازش بخواد که جدا بشن! "بیا از هم جداشیم." "…چی؟" "چیه؟فکر نمیکنی یکم بی انصافیه؟ " تو فکر می کنی منصفانه‌ست که از من بخوای وقتی با دختری دیگه ای قرار میزاری باهات ازدواج کنم؟

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

altTitles.fr: Le retour du joueur qui était congelé

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

altTitles.ja: 異世界建国記

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

description.en:
A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!

Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.en: Leisurely Farmer in an Alternate Universe
Carefree Farmer in a Different Dimension

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

title.en: Pashiri na Boku to Koisuru Banchou-san

The Lackey and the Delinquent Leader in Love

altTitles.zh: 小弟的我与热恋的番长

description.en:
Unoki-kun, a boy who's been bullied since elementary school, ends up becoming the exclusive errand boy of the top delinquent of his school, Toramaru-san, who told him "Be mine" right after entering high school. But the truth is that Toramaru-san meant it as a confession of love!!

This is the beginning of a love misunderstanding between Toramaru-san, who thinks she's in a relationship, and Unoki-kun, who thinks he's being bullied.
description.ja: 昔からいじめられっ子体質の卯之木くんは、高校に入学しても早々、不良のトップ――寅丸番長に「私のモンになれ」と専属パシリにされてしまう。でもその実、寅丸さんは卯之木くんに告白したつもりだった!? 恋人関係だと思い込んでる寅丸さんとパシリにされたと思い込んでる卯之木くんの勘違恋(かんちごい)の始まり☆
description.ru: Уноки — парень, над которым издевались с начальной школы, в конечном итоге становится мальчиком на побегушках главной хулиганки школы, Торамару, которая сказала ему «будь моим» сразу после поступления в среднюю школу. Но правда в том, что Торамару таким образом призналась в любви!! Это начало любовного недопонимания между Торамару, которая думает, что она в отношениях, и Уноки, который думает, что над ним издеваются.
description.pt-br: Unoki-kun, um garoto sofreu bullying desde o primário acaba se tornando o garoto de recados da maior delinquente de sua escola, Toramaru-san, que falou para ele “Seja meu” logo depois de entrar no ensino médio, mas a verdade é que Totamaru-san estava confessando seu amor!! Esse é o começo de um amor mal-entendido entre Toramaru-san, que pensa que está namorando, e Unoki, que pensa que está sofrendo bullying dela.

title.en: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono

altTitles.ja: 僕は妖しいキミのもの

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono

description.en: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?
description.ja: どんな相手とも「正しい関係」でありたい風紀委員・しょうちゃんは、幼なじみの紗夜に悩んでいた。淫魔の血を引く彼女は、「ラブラブえっち♡」をすべく、あの手この手で大好きなしょうちゃんにアプローチ。紗夜を筆頭に、「正しくない関係」を望む妖しい生徒たちに囲まれて、しょうちゃんは正しさを守りきれるのか！？
description.es-la: Shou-chan es un miembro del comité de moral pública que quiere que todo el mundo tenga una relación sana, y está preocupado por su amiga de la infancia, Sayo. Debido a que ella lleva la sangre de un súcubo, a menudo se acerca a su amado Shou-chan, de cualquier manera para darle “sexo amoroso y alegre”. Mientras él se empeña en tener una relación sana, la cual está llena de lujuria y rodeada de estudiantes cuestionables, ¿logrará Shou-chan mantener su cordura?

altTitles.ru: Помолодевшая бывшая жена в моём классе

description.en:
On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days!

Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
description.ja:
**離婚から始まる、新感覚ラブコメ！**

夫婦関係は冷え切り、離婚届を出したその帰り道。 黒瀬航平は自動車に轢かれ…高校時代にタイムスリップしてしまった！？ 新たな人生を謳歌しようと決意し高校へと向かうが、そこには当然、 元嫁の柚花がいて―――。

title.en: Ore ni wa Kono Kuragari ga Kokochiyo Katta: Zetsubou kara Hajimaru Isekai Seikatsu, Kami no Kimagure de Kyousei Haishinchuu

altTitles.ja: 俺にはこの暗がりが心地よかった　―絶望から始まる異世界生活、神の気まぐれで強制配信中―

altTitles.en: The Darkness Was Comfortable for Me

description.en:
“I will have the 1,000 people I have chosen go to a parallel world.”

Chaos spread once those words of God were displayed to the whole world.

Kurose Hikaru, whose childhood friend had been chosen, was killed together with her on the same day she was supposed to be transferred. However, for some reason, Hikaru didn’t die and, even though he wasn’t chosen at first, he ended up as one of the [Otherworlders that will have all their actions live broadcasted to Earth].

Transferred without any preparations at all to that accursed land, he faced threats innumerable times and somehow managed to survive with his Gift, the Dark Spirit Abilities.

“I must not die. I am sure the people on Earth are all rooting for me after all…”

This is the story of a young boy who is tossed about by the gazes of the viewers, yet eventually manages to raise his head and walk forward.
(NovelUpdates)

title.en: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界狙撃手は女戦士のモフモフ愛玩動物

altTitles.en: Another World Sniper Is Female Warrior's Mof-Moffy Pet

description.en:
A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife, he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up, he finds that he is no longer human - he’s now just some little furry thing. Near death, he comes across a beautiful warrior, who decides to take care of him because he’s fluffy. However, things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?  
  
From the writer of Time Stop Brave and Princess Resurrection comes a new isekai story, which has bears, boobs, and bullets.
description.ja: 非モテで金のない銃マニアの31歳のオッサンが異世界転生！でも変なモフモフのぬいぐるみっぽいモンスターに転生していた!?突如現れた女戦士と出会い一緒に冒険することに…!?銃マニアだった知識が異世界で役に立つ!?モフモフ異世界転生ファンタジー！

title.en: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru

altTitles.fr: Berserk de la Gourmandise : Celui qui surpasse le concept même de niveaux

altTitles.ja: Boushoku no Berserk: Ore Dake Level to Iu Gainen o Toppa Suru
暴食のベルセルク～俺だけレベルという概念を突破する～ THE COMIC

altTitles.zh: 狂怒的暴食 ～只有我突破了等级这概念～

altTitles.en: Berserk of Gluttony: The One that Exceeds the Concept of Levels

description.en: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
description.fr:
Dans ce monde, il y a deux types de personnes. Ceux qui ont un ou plusieurs "talents", et ceux qui n'en possèdent pas. Les personnes nées avec de puissant talents, exterminent les monstres pour monter en niveaux et devenir puissants, alors que ceux qui n'en possèdent pas deviennent des échecs et sont traités durement par la société. Nous suivons l'histoire de Fate, un homme travaillant comme garde aux portes de la ville et dont son seul talents est la gourmandise, un talent qui ne fait que lui donner faim.  


---
description.ro:
În lumea asta sunt două tipuri de oameni: cei care posedă “puteri” incredibile și cei care nu.  
Cei care au fost născuți cu asemenea “puteri” extermină monștrii, evoluează și devin oameni de success, în timp ce ceilalți devin eșecuri, și sunt tratați diferit de societate.  
Citește povestea lui Fate, un tip ce lucrează ca și gardian, a cărui putere este lăcomia, o putere care îl face să fie mereu înfometat.   
  


---

description.ru:
В этом мире есть два типа людей. Те, у кого есть сильные «навыки», и те, кто их не имеет. Люди, рожденные с мощными навыками, уничтожают монстров, чтобы стать успешными, в то время как люди без них становятся неудачниками, к которым жестоко относится общество. В нашей истории, парень, который работает в качестве привратника, и чье единственное умение — обжорство, умение, которое только делает его голодным.   
  


---
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, existem dois tipos de pessoas. Aqueles que têm poderosas “habilidades” e aqueles que não. As pessoas nascidas com habilidades poderosas exterminam monstros para subirem de nível e se tornarem bem-sucedidas, enquanto as pessoas sem eles, tornam-se fracassos, que são tratados com dureza pela sociedade. Fate é um cara que trabalha como um porteiro, e cuja única habilidade é a gula, uma habilidade que o faz comer almas.

altTitles.ja: 転生バリスタと無愛想な公爵様

description.en:
Roana/Loanna was raised in neglect and isolation as an illegitimate child of the Count Louis family.

She gets married off to Duke Bruggen, who orders her to keep quiet and out of the way. Free from all expectations or responsibilities, she decided to enjoy a leisurely life. She roams around the castle and on a walk, she found a familiar looking fruit in the garden. 

Using the knowledge from her previous life, and as a passionate barista in her past life, Roana/Loanna remembers exactly how to brew a perfect cup of Joe, she reproduced coffee to have a something to drink between her readings...

The trouble is, no one in this realm seems to know what "coffee" is, nor its wonderful benefits. As a matter of fact, coffee fruits are regarded as "evil":

"My brain is clearer than usual, full of energy, and new ideas keep coming to me."
"What is this? Is it a drug? What's the name of this drink?"
"...Thank you for letting me experience this."
"I've never had this kind of bevarage before!"
"It's very... very delicious."
"...."

But people from this the world loved coffee too much, and her husband who was supposed to be cold-hearted, act strangely now...

Can Roana enjoy her coffee life properly?

altTitles.ja: 波うららかに、めおと日和

description.en: In spring, 20-year-old Natsumi receives a marriage proposal to Takimasa Ebata, who works for the Imperial Navy. Suddenly, she is married to a Navy husband. Their (fairly) inexperienced in house matters, as well as in the affairs of men and women, begin their life as a couple in the highest degree of purity! When the sea breeze blows, I think of you. A story of a couple living in prewar Japan, spring, summer, fall, and winter, humble but gentle.
description.ja: 春。20歳のなつ美の元に帝国海軍に勤める瀧昌との縁談が舞い込む――。突然始まった、海軍の旦那さんとの結婚生活。家のことはもちろん男女のことにも（かなり）不慣れな二人の、ピュア度MAXな夫婦生活が始まる！潮風が吹けば、あなたのことを思い出す。戦前日本で暮らす夫婦の、春夏秋冬、つつましくも優しい日々の物語。

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...

description.en: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

Will they be able to acknowledge their feelings for each other, or will they reach a standstill in their pursuit of happiness?

description.en: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.

ผลงานมังงะเรื่องใหม่ของ อ.อิวามิ คิโยโกะ ผู้เขียน "Luminous = Blue"

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,

"อินเนอร์อย่างพวกเราไม่สามารถเอาชนะเอาเตอร์ได้"

เมื่อแรงเกอร์ในหอคอยลงความเห็นเป็นเสียงเดียวกัน
'คิมยูวอน' มนุษย์ผู้แกร่งกล้าเพียงหนึ่งเดียวในหมู่เทพเจ้า
จึงถูกเลือกให้ย้อนกลับมายังอดีตเพื่อเริ่มต้นทุกอย่างใหม่อีกครั้ง

และแกร่งขึ้นกว่าเดิมจนกลับไปเอาชนะ 'เอาเตอร์ก็อด'

よもやまこばなし

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

altTitles.fr: Her tale of Shim Chong : Loin des yeux (Delitoon)

altTitles.zh-hk: 她的沈清：丞相夫人與她的秘戀

altTitles.ja: 彼女の沈清

description.en:
Based on a Korean folktale, two very different women find themselves making the same wish - to leave this world behind. One is Shim Chong, a young beggar living off the kindness of others to support herself and her blind father. The other is the bride-to-be of old Chancellor Jang, sold off to him for the sake of her family. When Shim Chong rescues this new bride from the river, their relationship triggers both love and hidden intentions. But will these two women be able to find their way forth in a world that favors men?

description.fr:
Chong a perdu sa mère à la naissance et s'occupe de son père aveugle. Et à en croire les oracles, le triste sort de la jeune fille n'est pas prêt de s'améliorer, un destin terriblement funeste l’attend. Étrange, car depuis sa rencontre avec cette femme, son quotidien sent quand même bien meilleur. Littéralement ! Fleurs, bains chauds et huiles parfumées, la petite souillon va-t-elle seulement goûter à la vie en rose ou trouvera-t-elle le moyen de faire mentir les prédictions ?

[그녀는 왜 공양미를 대신 내준다고 했을까?]
심청전의 장 승상 부인은 왜 청이한테 공양미 300석을 대신 내준다고 했을까? 기발한 설정, 허를 찌르는 개그, 아름다운 작화로 예쁨과 병맛을 절묘하게 오가는 seri와 비완이 이번엔 심청전을 그린다. 장 승상 부인이 청이에게 그토록 마음을 쓴 이유는 뭘까? 그리고 청이는 왜 그걸 거절하고 인당수로 갔을까? 소외 계층 여성인 심청과 상류 사회 여성인 장 승상 부인, 두 여성의 연대와 사랑이 아름답고 섬세하게 펼쳐진다.

description.vi: Phu nhân tể tướng Jang vì sao lại nói với ShimJeong rằng sẽ bỏ ra 300 thạch gạo để chuộc cô về? Với tài năng gây dựng nên những tác phẩm vô cùng sống động và đẹp đẽ cùng cốt chuyện độc đáo, khiếu hài hước tinh tế, lần này, 2 tác giả Seri và Biwan đã vẽ nên trước mắt chúng ta câu chuyện về nàng ShimJeong. Lí do gì mà phu nhân tể tướng Jang lại phải dụng tâm vì Jeong? Và vì sao Jeong lại đi từ chối điều đó rồi lao mình xuống dòng sông InDang? Jeong-một cô gái thuộc tầng lớp thấp kém của xã hội, cùng với phu nhân tể tướng Jang -một người nằm trong tầng lớp cao quý, Nàng ShimJeong đã mở ra trước mắt chúng ta một câu chuyện tình yêu vô cùng ý nhị mà đẹp đẽ giữa 2 người phụ nữ trong thời đại xưa.
description.zh: 沈清年幼丧母，侍奉着盲人父亲，靠乞讨艰难度日。 有一日，沈清救起一位落入水中的年轻女子，而她恰恰就是年老丞相即将迎娶的新夫人。她对她十分热情，但沈清对小夫人的做法感到十分疑惑，却又不自觉的被她吸引…
description.pt-br: Shim Cheong perdeu a mãe apenas 7 dias depois de nascer, e com seu pai cego, passou a depender da bondade de outros vivendo como mendiga. Mas sua vida e seu coração mudariam depois de salvar a vida da mulher que iria se casar com o ministro Jang. Qual é a história por trás dessa lenda? O que realmente aconteceu? Será que essa história de amor terá um final feliz?
description.zh-hk:
韓國民間傳說的沈清傳，其中令人存疑的橋段或許是這麼發展的…
獨自行乞努力撫養盲父的沈清，某日在河畔向上天祈求，希望有朝一日自己能從這一切解脫，卻撞見一位在河上載沉載浮的美麗女子。殊不知這位美麗女子將會改變她的未來…

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

title.en: Sekai de Yuuitsu no Tenshokushi: Job Hopper na Ore wa, Isekai de Subete no Job o Kiwameru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.ja: 世界で唯一の転職師～ジョブホッパーな俺は、異世界ですべてのジョブを極めることにした～

altTitles.en: The Only Job Changer in the World: I, a Job Hopper, Decided to Master All the Jobs in Another World

description.en:
Tsukasa, a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions, challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant, leading to a sense of discouragement. But, the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!

With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman, mage, spear user, alchemist, appraiser, pharmacist, and more, he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items, he adapts effortlessly, engaging in everything from helping people to earning money. 

Unstoppable with his versatile skills, the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!
description.ja:
よりよい条件を求めて転職を繰り返す会社員・ツカサ。
大企業の最終面接に挑んだ彼は、気が付けば異世界へと転移していた。
これまでの経歴がまったく通用しない……と意気消沈モード。
だが、彼が授かった「転職師」は唯一無二の能力であった！
剣士、魔術師、槍使い、錬金術士、鑑定士、薬師etc.と、どんなジョブにも自由自在に切り替える力で、彼は悠々自適な異世界生活をスタートさせる。
魔物相手だろうが、煮るなり焼くなり斬るなりはお手のもの！
薬草からアイテムまで、溢れる知識で有効活用！
さらには、持ち前の順応力も発揮し、人助けにお金稼ぎにと、無双が止まらない!?
パワフル社畜が七色の職を駆使して跳ね上がる、キャリアアップ・ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: 拳精
鉄拳チンミ

description.en:
In ancient China a young fighter named Chinmi goes to the Dairin temple for advanced training. He eventually must leave Dairin temple to go on a pilgrimage where he meets many challenges to test his skills.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kung Fu Boy** (1991: tankoubon, 2011: bunko)

---

- **Won the 11th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: もう触れないキミ

altTitles.en: You Who Can't Touch Me Anymore

description.en: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...
description.ja: 昔触りまくっていた坊主頭の同級生が芸能人に…

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

altTitles.ja: 日食ステレオサウンド

description.en: 44 years ago, a novelist left behind a single masterpiece before cutting all contact with the world. This is a 48p gem of a read depicting the young painter who met him.
description.zh:
新作《沙之都》发行纪念！ 漫画界期待已久的杰出青年漫画家・町田洋的杂志出道作，终于迎来了数字化！ 
这本48页的短篇描绘了一位于44年前留下一部杰作后就不再与人交往的小说家和一位与他相遇的年轻画家间的故事！

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

description.en: A young girl named Fu, travels into the past to make sure that her parents don't get together...

title.en: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Octavinelle~

altTitles.ja: ディズニー ツイステッドワンダーランド THE COMIC ～EPISODE of OCTAVINELLE～

description.en:
“He walked into my life, step by step.
Assistant Manager Choi, Choi Jinhwan.
My first love whom I’m sick and tired of.”

Kim Minjun is a 30-year-old ordinary office worker.
Unlike the wishes of someone who is twenty, all Minjun wishes for is a month-long break. 

Choi Jinhwan, Minjun’s ideal type and first love, joined his company’s design team. 

‘So annoying…
seeing him speaking informally and having no social cues, the same annoying and selfish him. 
And the fact that he is still perfectly my type is even more annoying.’

I, Kim Minjun, am still my insignificant self.
description.fr:
Kim Min-joon, un employé de bureau de 30 ans. Contrairement aux jeunes hommes d'une vingtaine d'années qui souhaitent devenir quelqu'un d'important, il n'a qu'un seul souhait, celui de pouvoir faire une bonne pause pendant un mois seulement.

Devant les yeux de Min-joon, qui avait passé ses journées ennuyeuses, son premier amour, le type idéal parfait, Choi Jin-hwan va rejoindre comme nouveau membre de l'équipe de conception.

"Je suis bouleversé. Je ne sais pas quoi dire sans réfléchir, ce qui est encore arbitraire. Au milieu de tout ça, c'est si parfait.

altTitles.ja: 猫が如く

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat!? The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title Like a Cat, or Neko ga Gotoku, is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is Like a Dragon or Ryu ga Gotoku.

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
description.pt-br:
Izumo é um dos melhores alunos da escola e de aparência assustadora. Todo mundo tem medo dele, mas, na verdade, ele só quer amigos e uma vida escolar divertida. Um dia, ele é visado por uma súcubo chamada Anastasia, que tenta roubar sua alma virgem.

NOTA: Isto é um reboot da obra com arte aprimorada, mas com a história semelhante à da versão anterior.

title.en: Ponkotsu ga Tensei Shitara Zongai Saikyou

altTitles.ru: Отбросы переродились, и вопреки ожиданиям, стали сильнейшими

altTitles.ja: ポンコツが転生したら存外最強

description.en:
A bit dumb yet cute girl and a kind-hearted and tolerant girl. Those are the childhood friends of the boy whose peaceful life is turned around after being reborn in another world. Will they be able to survive in another world with only useless skills!? They’ll manage somehow…!  
  
Ponkotsu: literally means “Trash” or “useless” or “unreliable” when insulting a person.
description.ru:
Миленькая подруга детства, у которой чутка не все дома, и добрая, эмпатийная подруга детства. С этими девочками парень тихо и мирно проводил свои дни, пока всё резко не поменяло «переселение душ». Можно ли выжить в ином мире с одними лишь помойными скиллами?!!  
Как ни странно, всё-таки как-то можно!
